verbs.description: [ARG0: islanders] [V: aim] [ARG1: to maintain unblemished division record vs devils] everyone knew things would be different for the new york islanders after the departure of generational talent john tavares but few people expected the difference to manifest itself in a potentially record - setting start for the islanders who will look to remain perfect in the metropolitan division when they host the new jersey devils on saturday night at barclays center metropolitan division john tavares ice hockey new jersey devils devils john tavares new york islanders barclays center new york
